lines.text: ALEX LEVINE
February ,1997
CURRICULUM VITAE
Personal:
Born in Vilnius, Lithuania, 1956.
Married, two children.
Education, Emplovment, Awards:
B.Sc. Faculty of Agriculture, Rchovot, I lebrew University of Jerusalem.
Graduated with honors.
Dean's List for academic achievements
Ficld crop manager, kibbutz Adamit.
Graduate student, Dept. of Cellular Biochemistry, Hadassah Medical
School, Hebrew University of Jerusalem.
Thcsis title: The Effect of DNA Mcthylation on Chromatin Structure and
Gcne Transcription. Thesis advisor: Prof. Aharon Razin.
Visiting fellow, Laboratory of Comparative and General Biochemistry,
NIH, Bethesda MD. Study of protcin methylation and DNA demethylation.
A warded the Fogerty short term fellowship
Visiting fellow, Instituto Policatedra di Chimica Biologica, Universita
degli Studi di Genova, Italy. Study of protein kinase C in erythrolcukemia cell
differentiation.
A warded the EEC short term fellowship
Post Doctoral Fellow. Laboratory of Molccular Plant Biology,
The Salk Institutc for Biological Studies, La Jolla CA. USA.
Study of the pathogen induced oxidative burst in plants
Awarded thc BARD Postdoctoral Fellowship
Executive Officer, Pharmore USA, San Diego CA. (Biotech company)
Lccturer, Institutc of Life Scicnces, Hcbrew University of Jerusalem.

full_text:
ALEX LEVINE
February ,1997
CURRICULUM VITAE
Personal:
Born in Vilnius, Lithuania, 1956.
Married, two children.
Education, Emplovment, Awards:
1981-1984
B.Sc. Faculty of Agriculture, Rchovot, I lebrew University of Jerusalem.
Graduated with honors.
1982-1983
Dean's List for academic achievements
1984-1985
Ficld crop manager, kibbutz Adamit.
1986-1991
Graduate student, Dept. of Cellular Biochemistry, Hadassah Medical
School, Hebrew University of Jerusalem.
Thcsis title: The Effect of DNA Mcthylation on Chromatin Structure and
Gcne Transcription. Thesis advisor: Prof. Aharon Razin.
1989, May
Visiting fellow, Laboratory of Comparative and General Biochemistry,
1991, Aug
NIH, Bethesda MD. Study of protcin methylation and DNA demethylation.
A warded the Fogerty short term fellowship
1990, Oct
Visiting fellow, Instituto Policatedra di Chimica Biologica, Universita
degli Studi di Genova, Italy. Study of protein kinase C in erythrolcukemia cell
differentiation.
A warded the EEC short term fellowship
1992-1995
Post Doctoral Fellow. Laboratory of Molccular Plant Biology,
The Salk Institutc for Biological Studies, La Jolla CA. USA.
Study of the pathogen induced oxidative burst in plants
Awarded thc BARD Postdoctoral Fellowship
1994-1995
Executive Officer, Pharmore USA, San Diego CA. (Biotech company)
1995-
Lccturer, Institutc of Life Scicnces, Hcbrew University of Jerusalem.
LIST OF PUBLICATIONS
1. Raz.in A., Levine A., Kafri T., Agostini S., Gomi T. and Cantoni GL.
Relationship bctween transient DNA hypomethylation and crythroid
differcntiation of murine erythroleukcmia cells Proc. Nat_ Acad. Sci. USA
(1988) 85:9003-9006.
2. Razin A., Levine A., Kafri T., Agostini S. and Cantoni GL. DNA
hypomethylation and differentiation of Friend crythroleukemia cells. Genc
(1988) 74: 139-41.
